[00:00.00]Love You Different - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)/BEAM

[00:03.33]I will love you different
[00:08.89]Just the way you are
[00:10.66]And I will love you different
[00:15.94]
[00:19.53]You pull up in a foreign
[00:22.12]You that New York time easy Sunday morning
[00:25.25]Front seat
[00:25.88]When we touch I think we skip a beat
[00:28.62]Beep beep beep
[00:29.75]Let's a movie with you got me at the edge
[00:32.28]Let me see
[00:33.69]There's beauty on your lips
[00:36.71]
[00:37.53]I drown with every kiss
[00:39.16]I'm not used to this
[00:41.28]There's nothing I won't give
[00:44.16]
[00:44.89]Don't like making promises
[00:46.72]Just remember this
[00:48.53]I will love you different
[00:53.65]
[00:54.20]Just the way you are
[00:55.85]And I will love you different
[01:01.18]That's what you been looking for
[01:04.15]You're the fruit of my life
[01:05.82]That patient kind
[01:07.72]That tongue got me tongue tied
[01:09.63]And that's why
[01:11.31]I will love you different
[01:16.20]
[01:16.81]Just the way you are
[01:18.74]
[01:19.61]No matter how different
[01:21.87]You're beautiful
[01:23.42]I can't make this up no baby
[01:25.46]Ain't no need to beat your face
[01:27.10]And Fenty want you on the cover
[01:29.26]Under covers ain't no rubbers
[01:31.17]On this planet I'll treat you like a mother
[01:33.24]Let's make babies
[01:34.23]There's beauty on your lips
[01:36.75]
[01:38.03]I drown with every kiss
[01:39.68]I'm not used to this
[01:41.68]There's nothing I won't give
[01:44.56]
[01:45.29]Don't like making promises
[01:47.28]Just remember this
[01:49.09]I will love you different
[01:53.92]
[01:54.74]Just the way you are
[01:56.30]And I will love you different
[02:01.63]That's what you been looking for
[02:04.04]
[02:04.60]You're the fruit of my life
[02:06.33]That patient kind
[02:08.19]That tongue got me tongue tied
[02:10.09]And that's why
[02:11.69]I will love you different
[02:16.63]
[02:17.30]Just the way you are
[02:19.12]
[02:19.80]I and I
[02:20.69]
[02:21.34]Need you in my life
[02:23.09]Even when the fire burning I need you fi di the light
[02:26.84]Let's a different night
[02:28.54]With you right by my side
[02:30.44]You mix the color color color color see the future bright
[02:34.31]This here mutual it's not usual
[02:36.49]When I'm around you I-I-I
[02:39.05]Ooh
[02:40.23]Dem goose bumps dem goose bumps
[02:42.25]The truth hurts and you know
[02:44.03]A real ting we feel this time
[02:46.22]Ooh
[02:47.62]You gimme goose bumps yeah yeah
[02:49.46]I will love you different
[02:54.54]
[02:55.18]Just the way you are
[02:56.88]And I will love you different
[03:02.31]That's what you been looking for
data.trans:
[ti:Love You Different]
[ar:Justin Bieber/BEAM]
[al:Justice (中国特别版)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.11]//
[00:02.22]//
[00:03.33]我会给你不一样的爱
[00:08.89]爱真实的你
[00:10.66]我会给你不一样的爱
[00:15.94]
[00:19.53]你开着进口汽车
[00:22.12]享受纽约时光 轻松惬意的周日早晨
[00:25.25]前排座位
[00:25.88]我们肌肤相亲时 我觉得我们漏了一拍
[00:28.62]//
[00:29.75]和你在一起 就像电影场景 让我不能自已
[00:32.28]让我看看
[00:33.69]你的双唇美丽无比
[00:36.71]
[00:37.53]每一次亲吻都让我沉醉
[00:39.16]我还不习惯
[00:41.28]没有什么是我不愿付出的
[00:44.16]
[00:44.89]不喜欢许诺
[00:46.72]只想你记住
[00:48.53]我会给你不一样的爱
[00:53.65]
[00:54.20]爱真实的你
[00:55.85]我会给你不一样的爱
[01:01.18]那就是你所寻觅的东西
[01:04.15]你是我的生命果实
[01:05.82]充满耐心地等待
[01:07.72]你的话语让我无法言语
[01:09.63]这就是为什么
[01:11.31]我会给你不一样的爱
[01:16.20]
[01:16.81]爱真实的你
[01:18.74]
[01:19.61]不管多么不同
[01:21.87]你都美丽无比
[01:23.42]这我不可能胡编乱造 宝贝
[01:25.46]没必要修饰你姣好的面容
[01:27.10]想要和你密会
[01:29.26]在被窝之中 尽情缠绵
[01:31.17]在这个星球 我会把你当做母亲一样对待
[01:33.24]让我们生宝宝吧
[01:34.23]你的双唇美丽无比
[01:36.75]
[01:38.03]每一次亲吻都让我沉醉
[01:39.68]我还不习惯
[01:41.68]没有什么是我不愿付出的
[01:44.56]
[01:45.29]不喜欢许诺
[01:47.28]只想你记住
[01:49.09]我会给你不一样的爱
[01:53.92]
[01:54.74]爱真实的你
[01:56.30]我会给你不一样的爱
[02:01.63]那就是你所寻觅的东西
[02:04.04]
[02:04.60]你是我的生命果实
[02:06.33]充满耐心地等待
[02:08.19]你的话语让我无法言语
[02:10.09]这就是为什么
[02:11.69]我会给你不一样的爱
[02:16.63]
[02:17.30]爱真实的你
[02:19.12]
[02:19.80]我
[02:20.69]
[02:21.34]我的人生需要你
[02:23.09]即使烈焰熊熊 我也需要你带来光明
[02:26.84]那是与众不同的夜晚
[02:28.54]有你在我身边
[02:30.44]你制造斑斓的色彩 让我看到光明的未来
[02:34.31]我们互相喜欢 不同寻常的感情
[02:36.49]当我在你身旁
[02:39.05]//
[02:40.23]总是激动不已
[02:42.25]真相伤人 你知道
[02:44.03]我们之间是真爱
[02:46.22]//
[02:47.62]你让我感到激动不已
[02:49.46]我会给你不一样的爱
[02:54.54]
[02:55.18]爱真实的你
[02:56.88]我会给你不一样的爱
[03:02.31]那就是你所寻觅的东西
